title: The Jewel of Techacal
description: Lana's father, an archeologist, comes to the university with what he thinks is a cursed relic. Lex Luthor then steals the jewel in order to sell it to the highest bidder.

title: A Kind of Princess
description: Clark falls for Sara, the daughter of a crime boss. Both Clark and Sara get stuck in the middle between rival crime syndicates, and it is up to Superboy to save everyone.

title: Back to Oblivion
description: TJ goes to a scrap yard to investigate strange things that have happened there. When he arrives, he is trapped in a crushing machine by the old man, Mr. Wagner, who owns the scrap yard.

title: The Russian Exchange Student
description: When a scientist's formula to improve the efficiency of gasoline is nearly destroyed, a Russian exchange student named Natasha is accused of sabotaging the computer that the formula was stored on.

title: Countdown to Nowhere
description: The world first learns of the new hero, Superboy, when he rescues Lana Lang from kidnapper Roscoe Williams (Doug Barr).

title: Bringing Down the House
description: A rock star, Judd Faust, wants the amusement park and puts everyone in danger when the owner refuses to sell it to him. Lana falls in love with Judd but learns of his true nature when he takes her away one night and puts her in a torture device.

title: The Beast and Beauty
description: A Superboy impersonator is robbing banks and jewelry stores to get a million dollars so he can marry Florida's beauty queen.

title: The Fixer
description: Clark discovers that Luthor is trying to fix some of the school's basketball games so that he make a killing in betting. And the way he does that is, that he has a photo of the team's star player in a compromising position that if it got out it would ruin his career.

title: The Alien Solution
description: A strange cloud-like alien who can take over others bodies comes to earth hoping to steal Superboy's body so he can add it to his collection of warriors.

title: Troubled Waters
description: A businessman wants to buy all the farms in the Smallville area during an agricultural depression. Mr. Kent wants to find out why. Kenderson, the businessman, has something to hide and tries to kill Mr. Kent but he is unsuccessful.

title: The Invisible People
description: A large group of homeless people are living in front of a beach club on a Florida beach. They were promised jobs by the wealthy beach club owner, who never gave them anything.

title: Kryptonite Kills
description: A Kryptonite meteor falls in Addis Ababa and is sent to Shuster for study. It turns up in Clark's class on minerals. There, Clark feels the pain of kryptonite for the first time.

title: Revenge of the Alien: Part 1
description: The alien from "The Alien Solution" escapes after a thief steals the canister containing him. He wants revenge on Superboy for destroying his collection of warrior bodies.

title: Revenge of the Alien: Part 2
description: Now controlling Pa Kent, the alien makes his move to get revenge. He kidnaps Lana and holds her hostage on a rooftop near Shuster University.

title: Stand Up and Get Knocked Down
description: TJ finds his friend Michael dead outside of the Bonkerz comedy club. TJ wants to find out what happened to him, so he goes to the club's amateur night.

title: Meet Mr. Mxyzptlk
description: Superboy is called on to help remove a totem pole from the ground so it can be studied. When he arrives, the totem won't budge.

title: Birdwoman of the Swamps
description: When a bulldozer is turned over at a construction site, TJ and Clark decide to investigate. Clark meets an old Indian woman who believes the birds turned over the bulldozer.

title: Terror from the Blue
description: After witnessing a police officer being gunned down by a corrupt colleague, Lana is targeted by crooked cops.

title: War of the Species
description: T.J. discovers a government created robot that killed someone. Superboy manages to save him. When a government official tells them that everything is classified they leave. Later the man confronts the creator who seems have other plans. He later grabs T.J. setting a trap for Superboy.

title: Little Hercules
description: Clark and TJ visit a young high school genius named Billy Hercules who has been offered a scholarship by Shuster University. Clark be friends the boy, with whom he can relate as both are different and out of place.

title: Mutant
description: Clark witnesses the kidnapping of Professor Craig Lipcott, a famous nuclear scientist. As Superboy, he follows the kidnappers to a rooftop and sees them enter a strange ship just before he is attacked by a powerful ray that leaves him disoriented.

title: The Phantom of the Third Division
description: Jonathan Kent is being stalked by a man with whom he fought alongside during the Korean War. As Clark, Lana and T.J. come to Smallville for a visit, Mr. Kent is lured to the Smallville hospital and kidnapped by the man.

title: Black Flamingo
description: An attempted assassination of a senator leads Superboy to a mysterious nightclub.

title: Hollywood
description: Professor Zugar, invents a time machine and sends himself and Superboy back in time to Hollywood in the 1930s. Superboy meets a famous actor, Victoria Letour, and discovers that she is being stalked by men who want to kill her.

title: Succubus
description: A beautiful vampire-like creature seeks to drain Superboy of his life force and seduces TJ as part of her plot.

title: Luthor Unleashed
description: Luthor steals a powerful weapon developed by the army and prepares to sell it to weapon dealers. Later, while Luthor is working in the Shuster laboratory, he causes an explosion, and Superboy saves him by blowing the chemical fumes out of the building.

title: With This Ring, I Thee Kill
description: Lex Luthor returns, kidnaps Lana, forces her to marry him, and assumes the identity of a doctor that created a weapon that could paralyze Superboy forever.

title: Lex Luthor: Sentenced to Die!
description: Superboy is aided by Professor Peterson and the two believe that he will one day be able to use his legs and powers again. Lex Luthor taunts the superhero with his new bride, Lana.

title: Metallo
description: A heart attack patient, who is also an escaped convict, transforms into a cyborg with a heart powered by kryptonite.

title: Young Dracula
description: Superboy and Lana get caught in the middle of a battle between two vampires.

title: Nightmare Island
description: Trapped on a deserted island after Andy's motorboat sinks, Clark gets stripped of his powers by an alien who also kidnaps Lana.

title: Bizarro... the Thing of Steel
description: Bizarro, an imperfect duplicate of Superboy, is accidentally created when the real Superboy steps in front of Professor PetersonÂ's new duplicating ray.

title: The Battle with Bizarro
description: Superboy battles to free Lana from Bizarro while Prof. Peterson uses his duplicating ray on kryptonite to create Bizarro Kryptonite with the hope that it will end the Bizarro menace.

title: Mr. and Mrs. Superboy
description: Superboy and Lana pretend to be the adoptive parents of Mr. Mxyzptlk when he returns from the fifth dimension to stop the havoc caused when a giant follows him seeking revenge.

title: Programmed for Death
description: Superboy must stop a robot that has reprogrammed itself to avenge the death of its creator by killing both Andy and his father.

title: Superboy's Deadly Touch
description: Superboy is shot with a laser by Lex Luthor that sends his powers out of control and makes him dangerous to others.

title: The Power of Evil
description: A dark, malevolent force breaks its bonds and seeks to eradicate Superboy, the greatest force of good.

title: Superboy... Rest in Peace
description: A female android from the future assists Superboy against another android sent to destroy him.

title: Super Menace!
description: After running tests on kryptonite to try and neutralize its effects on Superboy, the military accidentally alters it so it has emotional effects on him, making him apathetic.

title: Yellow Peri's Spell of Doom
description: A doll belonging to a shy waitress comes to life and turns her into a sorceress and then they both work to make Superboy fall in love with her.

title: Microboy
description: Hoping to impress Lana, a fellow student invents an energy capsule that makes him a superhero, but he is unable to control his new found powers.

title: Run, Dracula, Run
description: A lost serum must be found that keeps vampire cravings at bay before Superboy and Lana become undead forever.

title: Brimstone
description: Superboy falls under the spell of the evil sorcerer Prodo until a mysterious man named Brimstone lends his assistance. Philip Michael Thomas guest stars.

title: Abandon Earth
description: Two aliens, claiming to be Superboy's birth parents, Jor-El and Lana, come to Earth looking for their son.

title: Escape to Earth
description: Superboy finds things get complicated when Lana finds out about his secret identity while on the aliensÂ' ship.

title: Superstar
description: A rock singer faces an attempt on her life.

title: Nick Knack
description: A crazed genius seeks revenge on Superboy for being imprisoned after he develops a suit that steals away the superheroÂ's powers.

title: The Haunting of Andy McAlister
description: While spending the weekend at an Andy's Uncle's old mansion, Andy, Lana and Clark get pulled into a vortex leading to a ghost world.

title: Revenge from the Deep
description: Lanas body is overtaken by a vengeful soul looking to settle a score over unrequited love.

title: Secrets of Superboy
description: After the villain Nick Knack escapes from prison, he captures Lana and Andy and probes their minds discovering Superboys weaknesses. Gilbert Gottfried guest stars.

title: Johnny Casanova and the Case of Secret Serum
description: Johnny Avonasac, a tennis player, finds a mysterious potion left behind by his dead brother that transforms into Johnny Casanova, an overweight slob who also happens to be a magnet for women, including Lana.

title: The Woman Called Tiger Eye
description: A sorceress called Tiger Eye captures Lana and turns her into a snake to lure Superboy into attempting a rescue so she can ensnare him in a spell and make him her own.

title: The Bride of Bizarro: Part 1
description: Bizarro returns from deep space and enters into a deadly pact with Lex Luthor. Lex will "create" a bride for Bizarro in exchange for a supply of kryptonite which can kill Superboy.

title: The Bride of Bizarro: Part 2
description: Bizarro has fallen deeper into Lex Luthor's plot to kill Superboy in exchange for a bride.

title: The Lair
description: Superboy is lured into deadly danger, and to survive he must avoid "The Lair."

title: Neila
description: A superhuman woman arrives from an alien world in search of husband, causing destruction in her wake. To stop her, Superboy must pass her romantic test, all while teaching her the true meaning of love.

title: Roads Not Taken: Part 1
description: The deceptive Dr. Winger transports Lex Luthor into an alternate earth, luring Superboy into the portal to rescue him by holding Lana captive. But when Superboy arrives in the strange world his powers are weak and Lex is stronger than ever!

title: Roads Not Taken: Part 2
description: Still trapped in Dr. Winger's alternate earth, Superboy encounters a homeless Lana and an alternate version of himself, an evil dictator called Sovereign. To escape and save Lana, he must battle Sovereign, all while hoping Lex will come to his aid.

title: The Sons of Icarus
description: Capital City finds itself in the middle of a mystery as random fires keep appearing all over the city. When Superboy investigates he discovers a connection to an ancient tribe of flying warriors called the Katia.

title: Carnival
description: When Superboy discovers a mysterious carnival that is stealing the souls of its patrons, his moral and physical courage is put to the test.

title: Test of Time
description: Two aliens from a mysterious planet accelerate the time on Earth in order to study Superboy's powers and weaknesses.

title: Mindscape
description: Superboy's life is in peril when an alien creature attaches itself to his body, causing him horrific nightmares in which he battles his alter ego of Clark Kent.

title: Superboy... Lost
description: Superboy experiences amnesia after he is injured trying to stop a speeding meteorite. Now his only hope for remembering who he is lies with the mother and son who found him wounded in the woods.

title: Special Effects
description: A rip in the time continuum has unleashed a wave of deadly creatures. When a prominent movie producer is killed, Superboy must investigate and ultimately fight for his life as the monsters attack.

title: Neila and the Beast
description: Neila, the superwoman from another planet, returns once again to Earth. This time she needs Superboy's help to destroy a gruesome creature who is seeking to kill her.

title: The Golem
description: An elderly Jewish man creates the mythical creature Golem to protect him from racial bigotry. But when Golem goes on a rampage, Superboy has to step in and save the day.

title: A Day in the Double Life
description: Its annual review time and Clark Kent has to recount for his boss a typical day in his life. Carefully working around the excitement he leads as Superboy, Clark paints himself as a boring, all American boy.

title: Bodyswap
description: Lex Luthur tricks Superboy into switching bodies with him, causing mass confusion in Capital City

title: Rebirth: Part 1
description: Superboy retreats to Smallville after he thinks he accidentally kills a leader of a dangerous gang. But did he or was it something more mysterious?

title: Werewolf
description: Superboy faces one of his most dangerous foes yet in "Werewolf."

title: People vs. Metallo
description: Superboy is put on trial after Metallo overtakes him in court using kryptonite. Can Superboy stop him before it is too late or will he be the one found guilty?

title: Jackson and Hyde
description: It is a dangerous case of split personalities as Superboy battles evil in "Jackson And Hyde."

title: Mine Games
description: Superboy and Lex Luthor have a heart-to-heart after they end up trapped together in a mine.

title: Wish for Armageddon
description: Superboy discovers that he unknowingly entered into a contract with an evil force that uses his dreams to create actual world disasters.

title: Standoff
description: Clark Kent becomes one of many helpless victims in a hostage standoff. Can he save the day without revealing his secret identity?

title: The Road to Hell: Part 1
description: Superboy is transported to an alternate-reality jungle and turned into a child, where he must fight for his life and avoid the evil alternate version of Lex Luthor.

title: The Road to Hell: Part 2
description: Barely escaping the jungle, Superboy is transported to another alternate reality where the demented Dr. Winger admits to trapping him. Now Superboy will have to travel back through realities in order to save himself and defeat Lex Luthor.

title: A Change of Heart: Part 1
description: A wave of violence has broken out within the city, sending Superboy into tension-filled investigation. Little does he know he will soon be accused of murder.

title: A Change of Heart: Part 2
description: Lana's life is in peril as Adam blackmails Tommy into creating a weapon to kill Superboy.

title: The Kryptonite Kid
description: Kryptonite infects a young scientist during a lab explosion, causing him to use his new found powers against Superboy.

title: The Basement
description: Lana discovers an alien in her basement who steals her identity.

title: Darla Goes Ballistic
description: A strange formula gives Darla erratic powers, causing her to attack Superboy.

title: Paranoia
description: Paranoia strangles Capital City as residents become fearful of a race of invisible aliens who have just landed.

title: Know Thine Enemy: Part 1
description: Lex Luthor has a plan to destroy the world's population with a series of dirty bombs, but first he must get rid of Superboy.

title: Know Thine Enemy: Part 2
description: Superboy is trapped inside Lex Luthor's virtual reality computer program, and now Lana must enter the program to save Superboy before it's too late.

title: Hell Breaks Loose
description: A troublesome ghost is haunting the Bureau, wrecking havoc on the office and its employees. To stop him Superboy and Lana must discover the secret as to how the ghost was killed in the building fifty years earlier...

title: Into the Mystery
description: Trying to protect his Aunt Cassandra, Superboy confronts a force which he cannot win against when death takes a human form.

title: To Be Human: Part 1
description: While trying to help Bizarro with his depression, Superboy's powers are weakened, leaving him vulnerable to the evil villain Chaos, who plans to destroy him once and for all.

title: West of Alpha Centauri
description: Superboy is kidnapped by an alien force and taken to a paradise planet near Alpha Centauri. Will he ever return?

title: Threesome: Part 1
description: A prison psychiatrist helps Lex Luthor and Metallo escape, all three quickly turning their attention to stopping Superboy once and for all.

title: Threesome: Part 2
description: Superboy continues to battle the newly formed threesome of Lex Luthor, Metallo and Dr. Odessa Vexman. As their destructive potential continues to rise, Superboy must stop them before it's too late.

title: Out of Luck
description: Superboy continues to battle evil in "Out Of Luck."

title: Who Is Superboy?
description: Superboy's secret identity is challenged in "Who Is Superboy?"

title: Cat and Mouse
description: Superboy gets entagled in a dangerous game of "Cat And Mouse."

title: Obituary for a Super Hero
description: Lex Luthor has just hit Superboy with a deadly kryptonite bomb. Now he gloriously recounts in detail how he planned and executed the devious plan, which he feels certain has killed Superboy.

title: Metamorphosis
description: Superboy continues to battle changing evil in "Metamorphosis."

title: Rites of Passage: Part 1
description: Superboy looses his powers and now an investigation begins to discover the curious force that caused it.

title: Rites of Passage: Part 2
description: Superboy is on the verge of losing his powers forever, which causes his alter ego of Clark Kent to search for the elusive crystal which holds the key to his past and will ultimately lead him through his "Rites Of Passage."
